CustomField.description: Created for Certido Ticket# 327822 - This field will be populated with Auto date time stamp the first time a sub status is selected, required for AOG reporting only
CustomField.formula: IF ( ( SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c) > 0, FLOOR( (SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c))*24*60 + FLOOR( 24 * ( (SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c) - FLOOR((SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c)) ))*60 + ( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c) - FLOOR((SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c) - FLOOR((SubStatus_Selected_Date__c - Created_date__c)) ),8)) ),0)) , 0)
CustomField.label: Time to SubStatus
